body: I love the thought of being turned into a figurine by my own brother. Unable to move or call for help. Permanently paralyzed and raped by your own brother for the rest of your life.

Hmm it must have been tough for a man to be verbally abuse like this. I hope things get better for him and that he won’t be pushed into a darker path by all the rude comments below me. Beside why do people get so dramatic over hentai. This isn’t suppose to be normal, it’s suppose to be fictional, but to each their own. Kinda like how some people like TLOU2 and would allow Abby to get away with everything. Lol.
If anyone would compare their sanity to hentai like this then enjoy your adventurous life
I would've preferred time-stop, this is just fucked up.
Aaah, what am i reading... stories about author virgin fcker always got dumped from thot..
Fuck me...... Why do I come across the weird shit first?
Stories where the MC is a guy who needs to be killed do nothing for me, and this guy needs a bullet to the head. Totally fucked up story only a psychopath would like.
Lol, looks like the world has no police and nobody is going to realize those people have gone missing lol. But hey, i like these kind of story where girl became doll and got monopolized

dsfargeg - You do realize this is a fictional story involving fictional characters right? It might surprise you that fictional characters have no agency because they ARE NOT REAL! Maybe you should learn the difference between reality and pretend. I know its hard for a PC/SJW type like you to comprehend, but I am sure you can if you try.
I fucking love color panels like this.
That thing... Could be the new nuke. Of course, the guy uses it to get laid.
using force or taking away the agency of your partner because youre unable to get anyone on your own merits makes you an incredibly weak human being who should probably just kill themselves
Welp, I know what santa will get for me on Christmas. ;)
I would like to splendid device low.
